pages.text: $(item)Asparagus$() is a common Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(thing)itself$().$(br)Mature asparagus crops drop 1 to 5 asparaguses. Bone Meal can be used on asparaguses.$(br)$(item)Asparagus$() can be used as an ingredient in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes and is required for dishes like $(item)Asparagazpacho$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.
$(item)Asparagus$() can be obtained from breaking all variants of grass, which yields 0 to 1.
